title: Om Symbol

nouns: "Grilled Cheesus" is the third episode of the second season of the American television series Glee, and the 25th episode overall.
A religion in which rules exist to govern the means by which adherents participate in the religion.
An institution to express belief in a divine power
An institution to express belief in a divine power.
Organized religion, also known as institutional religion, is religion as a social institution, in which belief systems and rituals are systematically arranged and formally established.

description: A symbol often used in relation to the religions of Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism and Jainism.
apple_vendor_description: The Om emoji on Apple devices is a beautifully rendered symbol, often depicted in a warm, earthy tone with subtle gradients that suggest a sense of depth and tranquility. Apple's smooth shading and soft edges give the sacred sound's representation a serene and inviting feel. It's frequently used to express peace, mindfulness, meditation, or a spiritual connection in digital communication.
